title: Number of assaults by weapon U.S. 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of assaults for 4 number of Weapon useds.
Weapon used Other weapon has the highest Number of assaults and Knife or cutting instrument has the lowest Number of assaults.
There is a difference of 100744.0 between the maximum Weapon used Other weapon and minimum Weapon used Knife or cutting instrument.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Weapon used in the x axis and Number of assaults in the y axis.
